name: The Valkyrie Blaze
description:
the mega structure filled with ALS to wipe out somekind of alien or threatening life form that destroy humanity.the only human left/the master all alone create automatic evolution to ALS to create stronger life form-- the end product it's her (LISA). while he is dying inside the mega structure but somehow in the current time human living it mean they can stand the alien without the super science. but the automatic evo still running in the mega structure without someone knowing

HOW TO PLAY

shoot and slash the enemy for save the world
